p: The data set delivered by Qualtrics contained completed records from 403 participants, ten of whom did not meet the criterion of passing at least two out of three comprehension questions. Those records were eliminated, yielding a final sample of 393 participants for analysis (198 male, 195 female). The mean age of the sample was 46 (median =â€‰45, Q1 = 29, Q3 = 60). 2 The data set is available at https://github.com/StephanLewandowsky/Blog-comments.
